remarks: A variant of ~ onfununi for operations.  (Contributed by Eric Schmidt, 26-May-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
onovuni.1 $e |- ( Lim y -> ( A F y ) = U_ x e. y ( A F x ) ) $.
onovuni.2 $e |- ( ( x e. On /\ y e. On /\ x C_ y ) -> ( A F x ) C_ ( A F y ) ) $.
onovuni $p |- ( ( S e. T /\ S C_ On /\ S =/= (/) ) -> ( A F U. S ) = U_ x e. S ( A F x ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x $.
